title: I have more wins when I abuse my team then when I'm nice.
body: So your stat on me losing 15% more games is dumb.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keazINex,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-15T07:17:41.344+0000)
>
> wait didn't you quit league?

Be quiet weeaboo.
so abuse your team. tell them to mute you though.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keazINex,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-15T05:07:26.279+0000)
>
> so abuse your team. tell them to mute you though.

I wait until they mess up, like when the idiot adc in one of my games couldn't CS and kept getting outpoked so I told him to learn how to fucking play and took all the CS and kills. I then proceeded to call him worthless and abused him until he left, I then carried the match and we won 4v5 .Easy game, easy life.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keazINex,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-15T07:01:32.179+0000)
>
> I wait until they mess up, like when the idiot adc in one of my games couldn't CS and kept getting outpoked so I told him to learn how to %%%%ing play and took all the CS and kills. I then proceeded to call him worthless and abused him until he left, I then carried the match and we won 4v5 .Easy game, easy life.

Well done, keep up the abuse :)

Here we see Sackboy farming up down votes again...

Be honest, are you doing this just for the fun of it or something?
Personally I find being helpful is funner than being a forum troll...

I guess we all find different things fun :P


Heres my up vote :)

> 
> Be honest, are you doing this just for the fun of it or something?
> Personally I find being helpful is funner than being a forum troll...
> 
> I guess we all find different things fun :P
> 
> 
> Heres my up vote :)

I enjoy when people downvote me, it makes me smile.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keazINex,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-15T07:01:55.863+0000)

You sure? Should I change my up vote to a down vote?
